inlineContent.text: floating-point matrix as well as many mathematical operations commonly used to manipulate matrices. A
matrix is commonly used in graphics programming to represent scaling or rotation transformations to convert from one coordinate system to another.
structures treat the inputs as immutable, instead returning a new matrix that represent the results of the operation.

abstract.text: Speed up OpenGL ES or OpenGL app development. Use math libraries, background texture loading, pre-created shader effects, and a standard view and view controller to implement your rendering loop.
